task.title: Stopping the Car
task.shortdesc: Safely bring the car to a stop using a precise sequence of throttle, clutch, and brake operations.

prereq.p: Be prepared to control the car's speed and engine throughout the stopping process.

step.cmd: Partially close the throttle to reduce speed.
Press the clutch pedal forward into neutral to release high speed.
Apply the foot brake slowly but firmly until the car comes to a complete stop.
Pull the hand lever back to the neutral position.
step.info: Do not remove your foot from the clutch pedal before moving the hand lever to neutral, or the engine will stall.

substep.cmd: Open the throttle slightly to accelerate the motor

step.info: This method leaves the cylinders full of explosive gas, which helps with future starting.

result.p: The car is now safely stopped and the engine is turned off.

postreq.p: Aim to make these actions—disengaging the clutch and applying the brake—become automatic, especially in emergency situations.
